00011 // pbrt.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "api.h"
00014 // main program
00015 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00016         // Print welcome banner
00017         printf("pbrt version %1.3f of %s at %s\n",
00018                PBRT_VERSION, __DATE__, __TIME__);
00019         printf("Copyright (c)1998-2005 Matt Pharr and "
00020                "Greg Humphreys.\n");
00021         printf("For educational use only; commercial use expressly forbidden.\n");
00022         fflush(stdout);
00023         pbrtInit();
00024         // Process scene description
00025         if (argc == 1) {
00026                 // Parse scene from standard input
00027                 ParseFile("-");
00028         } else {
00029                 // Parse scene from input files
00030                 for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++)
00031                         if (!ParseFile(argv[i]))
00032                                 Error("Couldn't open scene file \"%s\"\n", argv[i]);
00033         }
00034         pbrtCleanup();
00035         return 0;
00036 }
